description: Module that collects power and energy measurements from a MODBUS RTU device

main.description: This is the main unit of the module

sunspec_base_address.description: sunspec base address of device ( 0, 40000 or 50000 )

watchdog_wakeup_interval.description: wakup interval of watchdog in seconds (default 60 seconds).

serial_device.description: Serial port the BSM hardware is connected to

baud.description: Baud rate on RS-485, allowed value range: 2400 115200 (19200 is default)

use_serial_comm_hub.description: When enabled, use a serial serial_communication_hub, otherwise use the configured serial device.

meter_id.description: Arbitrary string id, used as power_meter_id in interface powermeter.
